survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Subscription-Based Wine Clubs
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with subscription-based wine club services, including delivery experience, product quality, and overall service.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the wines received from the subscription service?
